name: Imageloader Uniquecopy Schema
description: Schema for the cm4ai imageloader input file uniquecopy

antibody.description: Antibody Identifier from Human Protien Atlas or negative control

ensembl_ids.description: Ensembl Gene ID for protien antibody targets, may have multiple matches

atlas_name.description: The Cell Line Name on which this IF antibody staining experiment took place

locations.description: Locations in the Cell in which the tagged protien was identified

n_location.description: Number of Locations in the cell where the taggedprotien was identified
